{"games":[{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4224276,"totalDownVotes":772629,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":199446,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812"},{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1124848,"totalDownVotes":119673,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":313822,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.
 
We are a small two person Dev team working hard to make Brookhaven the best it can be.
Thanks for playing!"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":612137,"totalDownVotes":47000,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":81250,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":268258,"totalDownVotes":33399,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"『New STAND』 Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":34149,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and much more! Please read the help section in the game's loading screen.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK DOWN BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

This game was created by UzuKee with the help in development from the Bizarre Studios team.

Disclaimers:
The game contains flashy lights and imagery that may cause discomfort or seizures to those with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised. In VIP servers, Item spawning is x1.3 more rare and long. You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":526949,"totalDownVotes":37011,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[UPDATE!] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":40123,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies
⚡Each Unit has Unique Cool Abilities
⬆️Upgrade your Troops During battle to unlock new attacks
⛩️Summon from the Gate and unlock New Units to use them in battles
🌀Team up with your friends to take on story mode or the infinity tower
🕒New things appear in the Summon Gate and Emote Shop every hour
Collect them all!

📝Join the Social Links to Gain Codes/Announcement/Updates
❤️Like the Game for More Codes!

🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu "},{"creatorId":5449496,"creatorName":"Lyte Interactive","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":391280,"totalDownVotes":38867,"universeId":2404080894,"name":"[TORD] Funky Friday","placeId":6447798030,"playerCount":39564,"imageToken":"T_6447798030_4d91","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"beat box battle

https://devforum.roblox.com/t/ff-credits-and-information

(Additional respective mod author credits can be found in-game)"},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3768209,"totalDownVotes":310566,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":57670,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2771877,"totalDownVotes":363242,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":33788,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"¡Corre hacia la cima a través de un enorme arsenal de armas! Conquista el día en un juego arcade de ritmo rápido, desde bazucas hasta libros de hechizos, ¡cada arma te mantendrá adivinando lo que sigue! ¡Gana BattleBucks y engaña tu juego con un gran selección de personajes, refriegas, efectos de muerte, máscaras y más!


-Translation by "L_umin0us""},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1019810,"totalDownVotes":51274,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":31820,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

- First Time you join game you have 0.1% to get free Conqueror Ability"},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":141789,"totalDownVotes":7830,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[2X LOGIA🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":13715,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":123247,"creatorName":"alexnewtron","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2194881,"totalDownVotes":300394,"universeId":140239261,"name":"💙 MeepCity 💙","placeId":370731277,"playerCount":64616,"imageToken":"T_370731277_ebb7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💙💙 The game that is Powering Imagination! And join our Roblox group/community!"},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2072239,"totalDownVotes":286833,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🌼High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":32003,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌼Violet and her little brother Bud are hosting an Egg Hunt! Ready to run fast and crack open Sur-Prize Eggs?🌼

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡

icon by @ixchoco_!"},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4356268,"totalDownVotes":589366,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak 👀","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":20754,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"👀


🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over four billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089"},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2134072,"totalDownVotes":657647,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":45466,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?



Owners of VIP-Servers can use the settings menu to skip rounds, set the tower size and lock the shop.

Sorry for anyone unable to use Shift-Lock due to Roblox binding chat to Shift+7 on some keyboards. This is a Roblox issue we are unable to fix"},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1418420,"totalDownVotes":118936,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":27049,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

Liked the game? Don't forget to leave a Thumbs Up(👍) and Favorite(🌟) . Thank you!

Don't forget to check out our group!
https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=2782840

Group Perks:
✨Member✨
--- 25% more gold!
💫Mega Member💫
--- 300% more health!
--- 25% more gold!
🌟Royal Member🌟
--- +4 Barrels Of TNT!
--- 300% more health!
--- 25% more gold!"},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":268877,"totalDownVotes":141762,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":20912,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1188435,"totalDownVotes":67865,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":16974,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":696256,"totalDownVotes":94481,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 🦌 [DESERT BOSS!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":15691,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Islands!

🌲 Build your own island
👩‍🌾 Create huge farms
🐔 Raise animals
💸 Sell items to make money
⚔️ Loot monsters and bosses
👨‍🍳 Cook tasty delicacies
🔥 And more!

Controls:
[E]: Open inventory

👑 Creators:
SnickTrix (https://twitter.com/lukechatton)
spleenhook (https://twitter.com/spleenhook)

🥁Music by https://twitter.com/too_many_fish"},{"creatorId":3333298,"creatorName":"Rumble Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":911060,"totalDownVotes":118633,"universeId":892043755,"name":"[🏆UPDATE + SALE🏆] Bubble Gum Simulator","placeId":2512643572,"playerCount":11743,"imageToken":"T_2512643572_64e","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🚨 UPDATE 75 🚨
🏆 New Bubble Pass for season 20!
💪 Competitive leaderboards are back!
🥚 New egg in the Shadow Realm (Corrupted Egg)
🐶 16 new pets!
🔥 ??
💰 60% off sale on all gamepasses!
💸 50% off sale on all boosts!
🐰 Easter event has ended! We hope you enjoyed our biggest egg hunt yet
🎮 Bug fixes for gamepad auto-hatch.

Subscribe to the Rumble Studios YouTube channel to redeem exclusive rewards, including a special pet, more inventory space, and free boosts! 👍 Tutorial: https://youtu.be/NweUYpsrS3c

Welcome to Bubble Gum Simulator! Blow bubbles to reach new heights in the clouds. Sell your bubbles or collect coins to buy upgrades! Hatch pets as companions to help you on your adventure.

A game by Rumble Studios."},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":186675,"totalDownVotes":30681,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ GOJO & HIEI ] Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":8821,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1795245,"totalDownVotes":140107,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":7791,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

[Update 5.5.1]
Map pool returned to normal non-holiday themed states
Added helmets for player models (no influence on bullet hitboxes)
New skins added to Creator Case and Meme 2 Case
Crane Site Revamp re-added to regular map pool

Thank you for continuing support for PF for over 5 years!"},{"creatorId":6465898,"creatorName":"Last EXE","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":11278,"totalDownVotes":2271,"universeId":2340432463,"name":"[New Event!!] Last Pirates","placeId":6329844902,"playerCount":10409,"imageToken":"T_6329844902_7145","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Current Level cap : 600
Current Fruit : Tori,Yami,Pika,Mera,Moku,Suna,Suke,Guru,Yomi,Bomu,Hie,Magu,Zushi,Gura,Soru,Bisu,Bari

Devil fruit spawn every 30 mins and respawn every 10 mins

Control
Q - Dash
Ctrl - Sprint/Run
Double spacebar - Geppo
F- Flash Step
J - Armament"},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2323055,"totalDownVotes":244103,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] CHAPTER 7!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":29854,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

Controls:
Pick up items / Use items - Click (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or Right Trigger (Controller)
Crouch / Place trap - CTRL (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or B (Controller)

Credits:
IK3As - Chapter 3, Chapter 7, Chapter 9, Chapter 11 Builder, Additional Chapter 8 Building, Book 2 Chapter 2 and 5 Building
Optikk - Build Mode
TenuousFlea - 'Billy' Model, 'Kraxicorde' Model
For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K."},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":661265,"totalDownVotes":128221,"universeId":115797356,"name":"Counter Blox","placeId":301549746,"playerCount":5181,"imageToken":"T_301549746_2abf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Take part in a 5v5 team based fire fight across a variety of maps spanning across the globe.

Earn in-match money by eliminating enemies and playing objectives, which you can use to buy new weapons, gear and grenades at the start of each round.

Press B to open buy menu at spawn, press N to open menu.

Enjoy FPS games? We've made four other FPS games you can play!
Check them out: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=2613928




"},{"creatorId":409640380,"creatorName":"MUCDICH","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":152600,"totalDownVotes":16850,"universeId":2294168059,"name":"The Mimic ","placeId":6243699076,"playerCount":10883,"imageToken":"T_6243699076_ec39","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Chapter 3 is finally here! 

CONTROLS:
Shift to Run for PC
L2 to Sprint for XBOX

ABOUT:  You go back to your old high school in hopes of finding your missing group of friends, however, you encounter a mysterious entity that lurks within your school. Eventually, you venture into the unknown depths of a mysterious world.


WARNING: This game contains Flashing lights, Loud Noises & Jumpscares!


Join the group for updates and your support:
https://www.roblox.com/groups/9482918/CTStudio#!/about

This game is not based on the movie. It was coincidentally made with the same title.


For best experience use headphones.


Tags: Horror, Abandoned, Lost, Mystery, Spooky, Terror, Scary, Creepy, Pineapples, School, Allergies, Japan."},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":514529,"totalDownVotes":42311,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":9668,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"[이 게임은 베타 버전이므로 버그가 있습니다!]
이 세상에서는 아무도 혼자 살아남을 수 없습니다. 친구들과 팀을 이루어 수많은 좀비를 물리치고, 보스와 싸우고 동전을 얻고 레벨을 올리며 새로운 타워까지 구입하세요! 당신이 모험심을 느끼고 있다면, 더 어려운 난이도의 더 어려운 보스들과 싸워보세요!

👥💵 그룹에 가입하셔서 $100 시작 현금을 받으세요! https://www.roblox.com/groups/4914494
